title: The Mysterious Case of Arthur Conley, Otis Redding's Protege
teaser: Singer Conley had a number of hits before disappearing in the '70s, a few years after his mentor Redding died in a plane crash. So where did he go? To Europe, where he changed his name.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
